to speak english? do you want to improve your english to get a better job? santa clara adult education offers a variety of classes to meet your needs.  we have free english classes for adults, levels 1- 5. these english classes are for students who want to go to college, get a job, or be active in their communities. classes provide practice in speaking, listening, reading and writing. we also have free classes offered through a partnership with local community colleges. please take a look at all of the classes listed below, and decide what’s right for you! update february 2026: classes are full
